| History                 = The Uncle Ben Foundation was created by [[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Peter Parker]] in honor of his late uncle, [[Benjamin Parker (Earth-616)|Ben Parker]]. It focused on using [[Parker Industries (Earth-616)|Parker Industries]]' technology to help the less fortunate and raise the quality of life wherever it could be possible.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 4 1}} Following the dissolution of Parker Industries, the Uncle Ben Foundation had to be shut down.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 795}}
